ABOUT.TITLE: About

BLOCKLY.TITLE: Blockly
BLOCKLY.TEXT1: Blockly for senseBox is a visual programming editor for the senseBox:edu. It is based on Google's Blockly and Carlos Pereira Atencio's Ardublockly, which has been forked.
BLOCKLY.TEXT2: Integrated support for over-the-air programming was developed at ifgi in a study project.

OPENSOURCE.TITLE: Open Source
OPENSOURCE.TEXT: This app is free & libre open source software. You may find the source code & issue tracker on GitHub:

ABOUT.HINT: Hint: A web version of Blockly for senseBox is available as well!

LOG_OPTIN.TITLE: Automatically send error reports
LOG_OPTIN.TEXT:
These reports help us in troubleshooting issues.
No personal information is collected, except for your Sketch.

RESET.TITLE: Reset App
RESET.TEXT: This will reset your settings and delete your Sketches!

INTRO.TITLE: Welcome
INTRO.TEXT: To transfer your code to your senseBox over the air (OTA), please follow these steps.
INTRO.STEPS: First, please make sure that your senseBox...
INTRO.STEP1: has the WiFi Bee plugged in XBee Slot 1

OTAMODE.TITLE: Enable OTA Mode
OTAMODE.TEXT:
To transfer your code, the senseBox must be in OTA mode.
This is indicated by the green blinking LED next to the red reset button.
OTAMODE.STEP1: press & hold the switch button (gray or blue)
OTAMODE.STEP2: press the red r eset button shortly
OTAMODE.STEP3: release the switch button after one second

AUTOMATIC.STEP1: Upload the Over-the-Air Sketch from the OpenSenseMap to the senseBox
AUTOMATIC.STEP2: Connect this device to the same network the senseBox is connected with

OTAMODESELECTION.AUTOMATIC: Choose this mode if your senseBox is currently running an OpenSenseMap Sketch acquired after 20.03.2020
OTAMODESELECTION.MANUAL: Choose this mode if you have uploaded the OTA Sketch

GO_ONLINE.TITLE: You are offline.
GO_ONLINE.TEXT: For compilation you need to connect to the internet. Please enable a connection.

MANUAL.TITLE: Connect to your senseBox
MANUAL.TEXT: Your senseBox should have created a WiFi network. Open your WiFi Settings and connect to the newly opened network. After you have established a connection return to the app.

AUTO.TITLE: Select your senseBox
AUTO.TEXT1: All powered senseBoxes around you with OTA mode enabled are listed here.
AUTO.TEXT2: Please check the last digits of the MAC-Adress on your WiFi Bee to identify your senseBox. You can find it printed on the bottom of the WiFi Bee.
AUTO.TEXT3: If you can't find your senseBox, please make sure that your WiFi Bee is mounted correctly, OTA mode is enabled and GPS is enabled on this device.
